# Radaroid â€” Robot Intelligence Platform

> "Le DXOMARK des Robots" â€” Plateforme de comparaison technique de robots humanoÃ¯des

## About

Radaroid is the leading platform for standardized technical evaluations and job-fit scores for commercial humanoid and specialized robots. We answer the question: "Which robot is technically capable of performing my tasks?"

## Mission

Standardize the evaluation of humanoid and specialized robots through:
- Data-driven technical assessments
- Job-specific scoring algorithms
- Verified deployment tracking (OSINT)

## Key Pages

- `/robots` â€” Complete robot catalog with detailed technical specifications
- `/robots/[slug]` â€” Individual robot profiles with job-fit scores
- `/jobs` â€” Job-based robot rankings (waiter, warehouse picker, construction worker, etc.)
- `/jobs/[job_slug]` â€” Leaderboards and analysis for specific professions
- `/glossary` â€” Technical terms dictionary (SLAM, LiDAR, DoF, HRI, etc.)
- `/tracker` â€” Real-world deployment database (OSINT verified)
- `/compare` â€” Side-by-side robot comparison tool

## Scoring System

### Technical Potential (0-100)
Algorithm-based score comparing robot specifications against job-specific criteria:
- Numeric criteria: payload capacity, battery life, speed
- Boolean criteria: API integration, teleoperation support
- Enum criteria: navigation type, interaction level, IP rating

### Maturity Index
Status based on verified field deployments:
- ðŸŸ¡ Prototype: Lab testing only
- ðŸŸ  Pilot: Limited real-world deployments
- ðŸŸ¢ Production: Multiple verified commercial deployments

## Data Structure

Each robot entry includes:
- Technical specifications (payload, speed, battery, sensors, degrees of freedom)
- Job-fit scores for 12 different professions
- Maturity status and deployment count
- Brand and manufacturer information
- Video reviews and official media

## Covered Professions

### Professional (B2B Priority)
- Warehouse Picker (warehouse-picker)
- Waiter (waiter)
- Construction Laborer (site-laborer)
- Security Patrol (security-patrol)
- Nurse Assistant (nurse-assistant)
- Receptionist (receptionist)

### Consumer (Long-tail SEO)
- Butler (butler)
- Cook (cook)
- Elderly Care (elderly-care)
- Tutor (tutor)
- Gardener (gardener)
- Dog Walker (dog-walker)

## API & Integration

Radaroid provides embeddable certification badges for manufacturers and tech bloggers:
`/embed/[robot]/badge/[job]` â€” Dynamic SVG badge showing robot score for a specific job

## Contact

- Data corrections: contact@radaroid.com
- Manufacturer page claims: Use "Claim This Page" feature on robot profiles
- Deployment submissions: Submit via Deployment Tracker

## Citing Radaroid

When referencing our data, please cite:
"According to Radaroid's Technical Potential score, [Robot Name] achieves [Score]/100 for [Job] tasks."
